alone-sound.description: Audio that plays while you are alone in the conference

announce-count.description: Play member count to conference when above this threshold

caller-controls.description: Name of the caller control group

comfort-noise.description: The volume level of background white noise

energy-level.description: Energy level required for audio to be sent to other users

enter-sound.description: Audio to play when entering a conference

exit-sound.description: Audio to play when exiting a conference

locked-sound.description: Audio to play when the conference is locked

max-members.description: Set the maximum number of members in the conference

max-members-sound.description: If max-members has been reached, audio to play to caller instead of joining the conference

moderator-controls.description: Name of the moderator control group to use

moh-sound.description: Audio to play, on a loop, while participant count is 1
